question: Will there be a Help-On-Demand feature through the Pennie Platform?
text:
Will there be a Help-On-Demand feature through the Pennie Platform?
          
        
We do not have plans to build a copy of the Federally Facilitated Marketplace (FFM) Help On Demand functionality. Well have the web-based broker directory that will be available directly from within the customers shopping and application experience.
